另一半.definition: other half; (fig.) spouse; one's better half

另一方面.definition: on the other hand; another aspect

另冊.definition: the Other List (Qing dynasty register of outlaws); a blacklist of undesirables

另外.definition: additional; in addition; besides; separate; other; moreover; furthermore

另存.definition: to save (a file) after options (name, location, format etc) have been selected by the user

另存為.definition: Save As ... (menu option in a software application)

另案.definition: another case (in law); a case to treat separately

另當別論.definition: to treat differently; another cup of tea

另眼相看.definition: to treat sb favorably; to view in a new light

另行.definition: (to do sth) separately; as a separate action

另行通知.definition: to notify at a different time; to notify later; to give prior notice

另覓新歡.definition: to seek happiness elsewhere (euphemism for extramarital sex); a bit on the side

另請高明.definition: please find sb better qualified than me (idiom)

另謀高就.definition: to get a better job somewhere else (idiom); to seek alternative employment

另起爐灶.definition: lit. to set up a separate kitchen (idiom); to start from scratch; back to square one; to start of on a new path

另開.definition: to break up; to divide property and live apart; to start on a new (path)

另闢蹊徑.definition: to take an alternate route (idiom); to find an alternative; to take a different approach; to blaze a new trail
